programme.title: Paul Murray Live
programme.desc: Paul Murray provides the last line of defence for common sense.

programme.title: The Bookshop
programme.desc: Set in a small town in 1959 England, a woman decides, against polite but ruthless local opposition, to open a bookshop, a decision which becomes a political minefield.

programme.title: A Long Way Down
programme.desc: Four people considering ending their own lives suddenly find a little sunshine when they come together on New Year's Eve.

programme.title: Tea with the Dames
programme.desc: Four old friends will reflect on their lives and careers, as they spend a weekend together at the retreat once shared by Joan Plowright and Laurence Olivier.

programme.title: The Secret Scripture
programme.desc: A woman committed to a mental hospital for much of her life must rely on her diary to recount her memories to a doctor who is reassessing her for the move to a new facility.

programme.title: Into the White
programme.desc: During World War II, enemy fighter pilots find themselves face to face after shooting down one another's planes over a desolate landscape. In order to survive, they must set aside the rules of war.

programme.title: Oranges and Sunshine
programme.desc: A powerful true story about a social worker who risks all in her effort to reunite families torn apart by a heartless government policy.

programme.title: My Generation
programme.desc: Painstakingly assembled over the last six years, British film icon Michael Caine tells the vivid and inspiring story of his personal journey through 1960s London.

programme.title: 44 Inch Chest
programme.desc: A man is shattered by his wife's infidelity. When his friends urge him to exact retribution, he wrestles with remorse, grief and self pity.

programme.title: Creation
programme.desc: Charles Darwin struggles to find a balance between his ideas of evolution and his relationship with his devout wife.

programme.title: McClaren
programme.desc: The story of Bruce McLaren, the New Zealander who showed the world that a man of humble beginnings could take on the elite of motor racing and win.

programme.title: Raging Grace

programme.title: The Shadow of Violence
programme.desc: In rural Ireland, an ex-boxer who has an autistic son and is the feared enforcer for a drug-dealing family has his loyalties tested when he's asked to kill for the first time.

programme.title: Dom Hemingway
programme.desc: Dom Hemingway is a larger-than-life safecracker with a loose fuse. Back on the streets of London after twelve years in prison, it's time to collect what he's owed for keeping his mouth shut.

programme.desc: Focuses on bringing you the most important global business and breaking market news and information as it happens.

programme.desc: Lori Keidel, her two sisters, and her brother are left home alone while their father goes to a nearby laundromat. Suddenly, a large blaze engulfs their brick ranch home.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman complaining of muscle aches in her back and shoulders suddenly dies. Can the doctors figure out what killed her?

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Upon returning from his morning jog, a man calls the front desk saying that his wife has fallen in the bathtub and is not breathing.

programme.title: Expert Witness
programme.sub-title: The Murder Of Sarah Payne: Fields Of Evidence
programme.desc: The heart-wrenching case of 8-year-old Sarah Payne who was abducted and murdered. A forensic ecologist finds a vital link between the suspect and the gravesite.

programme.title: Suburban Gangsters
programme.sub-title: Ray Denning and Jockey Smith: The Fugitives
programme.desc: 'Jockey' Smith, 'public enemy No.1', and Raymond John Denning, a campaigner for prison reform, are armed robbers who have the dash and cunning to escape from prison.

programme.title: Suburban Gangsters
programme.sub-title: Nik Radev and Dino Dibra: Catch and Kill Your Own

programme.title: On the Case
programme.desc: After a young girl disappears from a bus stop, a nine-day search reveals her abduction ending in a homicide. As police search to find her killer, the community rallies together to get justice.

programme.title: On the Case
programme.desc: A burned-out car and a blood-stained bedroom reveal the chilling murder of a community pillar. Will it be the smallest of clues that lead police to her heartless killer?

programme.title: On the Case
programme.desc: A young woman's disappearance marks the beginning of a heartbreaking murder mystery. Will a clue discovered by a child be the key to catching his mother's killer?

programme.title: On the Case
programme.desc: The abduction of a young mother from a crowded hospital parking lot is the beginning of a terrifying mystery that will torment her loved ones for decades.

programme.title: Somebody's Hiding Something
programme.desc: When 63-year-old Diana Burrow is found dead on her couch in North Carolina, authorities suspect natural causes. But small-town rumors lead police to investigate a potential homicide.

programme.title: Somebody's Hiding Something
programme.desc: When 18-year-old Rose Larner vanishes in Lansing, Michigan, detectives find no evidence or body. Despite a massive manhunt, her mother refuses to give up hope.

programme.title: Killer at the Crime Scene
programme.desc: A motorist discovers a foul-smelling suitcase and calls police, but the corpse within proves difficult to identify until authorities make a breakthrough.

programme.title: CI Australia: Most Infamous
programme.sub-title: Part 1: The Mornington Monster Part 2: The Will Of Death
programme.desc: A look at the Mornington Monster, a man who killed his wife, infant daughter and unborn child. Also, the suspicious death of a wealthy nightclub entrepreneur.

programme.title: Killer Cases
programme.desc: One summer night, Amanda Colley returns to a ransacked house. Her love interest Lamar and two girlfriends arrive to join her, and gunshots ring out. Amanda and her friend Lindy are found dead.

programme.title: Cops Who Kill
programme.desc: On August 28, 2001, officer Karl Bluestone kills his wife and two children before losing his life to suicide. This documentary reveals missed warning signs and the investigation into the tragedy.

programme.title: Moors Murders
programme.desc: Recounts the trial of the century, when Brady and Hindley are brought to justice in 1966. Hindley's brother-in-law David Smith and journalist Clive Entwistle recall the tension in court.

programme.title: Killer at the Crime Scene
programme.desc: Forensic teams and detectives collate evidence discovered at murder scenes to catch Britain's killers.

programme.desc: Corbett's most daring plan yet requires McQueen to exploit links with corrupt police officers. AC-12 make a shocking discovery.

programme.title: Line of Duty
programme.desc: Tensions rise in the OCG following the events at Eastfield. With troubling questions hanging over the identity of 'H', suspicions mount at AC-12.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: An ailing Poirot returns to Styles with Hastings nearly three decades after solving their first mystery there in order to prevent a serial killer.

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: Geordie and Cathy's separation causes tension in Grantchester and Geordie is surprised to learn that Cathy has invited her niece Bonnie to stay. Will and Geordie investigate the death of a businessman.

programme.title: Miss Marple
programme.desc: Poison pen letters are being sent to everyone in town. It seems like a vulgar joke, until a letter is found next to a suicide victim.

programme.title: Blue Murder
programme.desc: DCI Janine Lewis and her team continue their investigation into the murder of a schoolteacher.

programme.title: There She Goes
programme.desc: In February, Rosie is fixated on Christmas, pointing at the calendar, watching Home Alone, and demanding a tree. In 2007, Em and Si only speak to argue in front of Ben.

programme.title: The Larkins
programme.desc: After Norma confesses that the Jerebohms set up Pop and blackmailed the judge, Ma organizes her own sting operation against Pinkie; Rev. Candy agonizes over a moral dilemma.

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: Lizzie's housewarming unites staff members; Matron's new porter is getting too close for comfort; Dr. Nick Burnett wants a more-permanent position at the Royal.

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: Matron takes action to deal with her porter; Lizzie finds a soulmate; a family feud erupts into violence; Sister Brigid's faith is tested.

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: Geordie and Cathy's separation causes tension in Grantchester and Geordie is surprised to learn that Cathy has invited her niece Bonnie to stay. Will and Geordie investigate the death of a businessman.

programme.title: Rosemary & Thyme
programme.desc: Work on restoring the gardens at a country home is interrupted when two skeletons are dug up in the process.

programme.title: Smoggie Queens
programme.desc: Comedy about a new chosen family as they gather round Dickie when his boyfriend dumps him on the doorstep!

programme.title: Wolf Hall
programme.desc: Historical drama chronicling the rise of Thomas Cromwell. Henry VIII is desperate to annul his marriage.

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: DCI Vera Stanhope must piece together Luke Sumner's final hours in order to investigate his murder.

programme.title: Blue Murder
programme.desc: DCI Janine Lewis and her team continue their investigation into the murder of a schoolteacher.

programme.title: Frantic
programme.desc: In a hotel room in Paris, a doctor comes out of the shower and finds that his wife has disappeared. He soon finds himself caught up in a world of intrigue, espionage, gangsters, drugs and murder.

programme.title: Operation Petticoat
programme.desc: During World War II, a commander finds himself stuck with a decrepit (and pink) submarine, a con man executive officer, and a group of army nurses.

programme.title: Foul Play
programme.desc: This bizarre, Hitchcockian comedy sees a kooky divorcee and a bumbling Federal agent take on a posse of Hollywood weirdos planning to assassinate the Pope.

programme.title: Legends of the Fall
programme.desc: When the sons of a cavalry colonel set out to fight a war in Europe, suspicion and jealousy threaten to tear apart their once indestructible bond when the sexy Susanna enters their lives.

programme.title: Patriot Games
programme.desc: With his CIA days behind him, Jack Ryan is on vacation when he foils an assassination attempt on the royal family. An enraged IRA splinter faction targets him and his family in revenge.

programme.title: Dante's Peak
programme.desc: Without warning day becomes night, air turns to fire and the ground runs with molten terror. This is a spectacular volcano disaster movie with heart-pounding suspense.

programme.title: Frantic
programme.desc: In a hotel room in Paris, a doctor comes out of the shower and finds that his wife has disappeared. He soon finds himself caught up in a world of intrigue, espionage, gangsters, drugs and murder.

programme.title: Houseboat
programme.desc: A widowed man and his three children fall for an Italian woman who joins their floating home as housekeeper. He wins both their love and hers too.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An unforgettable and hilarious portrait of life's most rewarding occupation: Parenthood. The Buckmans are a modern-day family facing the age-old dilemma of trying to raise children the right way.

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: The thriller that scared movie fans everywhere out of the water. Three men undertake a perilous journey to hunt down a great white killer shark.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: Things are really hoppin' at Rydell High when Danny discovers the object of his summer fling, Sandy, has moved to town and enrolled in his school.

programme.desc: George doesn't hear the details on a project that Wilhelm wants him to champion. Peterman wants Elaine to bid on some golf clubs at an auction and gets into a bidding war.

programme.desc: A security repairman stationed on a desolate future Earth rescues a beautiful stranger from a downed spacecraft. Her arrival will trigger a chain of events that will leave man's fate in his hands.

programme.title: The 6th Day
programme.desc: A helicopter pilot who survives a near-fatal accident, returns home to find out that has been replaced by a duplicate version of himself.

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: Based on the classic Hasbro naval combat game, this is the story of an international fleet of ships that come across an alien armada while on a naval war games exercise.

programme.title: Godzilla: King of the Monsters
programme.desc: The crypto-zoological agency Monarch faces off against the mighty Godzilla, who collides with Mothra, Rodan, and his ultimate nemesis: the three-headed King Ghidorah.

programme.title: Bumblebee
programme.desc: Cybertron has fallen. When Optimus Prime sends Bumblebee to protect Earth, he begins his journey to become the hero the universe needs.

programme.desc: A battle between two alien robot clans, the Autobots and the Decepticons, is reignited on Earth, with a teenage boy being the only one who holds the power to stop it.

programme.desc: In a future where extreme sports have grown into TV reality bloodlust, a speedway champion is ordered by a ruthless warden to suit up and drive - or never see his little girl again.

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Godzilla and the almighty Kong face a colossal threat hidden deep within the planet, challenging their very existence and the survival of the human race.

programme.title: Back To The Future III
programme.desc: Marty McFly ends up in the wild west of 1885 to save mad scientist Doc Brown from a crazed gunfighter. It's the final chapter in the time-travelling comedy series.

programme.title: The Lost World: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: It has been four years since the disaster at Jurassic Park and two groups are in a race against time that will determine the fate of the remote island's prehistoric inhabitants.

programme.desc: Jake, a once-promising Jaeger pilot, has given up his training only to be caught up in a criminal underworld. He's given one last chance when an unstoppable threat is unleashed.

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
programme.desc: The Terminator is back and now he's one of the good guys, assigned to protect freedom fighter John Connor from a cyborg sent by the leader of the human resistance in the future.

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: When genetically modified dinosaurs run amok at a new themed resort, a former military man and animal expert must use his special skills to halt an all-out prehistoric slaughter.

programme.title: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom
programme.desc: When the abandoned island's dormant volcano begins roaring to life, Owen and Claire mount a campaign to rescue the remaining dinosaurs from this extinction-level event.

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: When one police droid, Chappie, is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself.

programme.desc: The hoya, or sea pineapple, is one of the ocean's hidden delicacies. Visit a major production area in northern Japan, and feast your eyes on a number of tasty hoya dishes.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE
programme.desc: At dusk in summer, a woman is absorbed in reading a letter. This chic lady is actually an advertisement model for Mitsui Echigoya, one of the top kimono fabric stores in Edo.

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: A young fisher is learning the art of aquaculture from his grandfather. But rising temperatures and labor shortages pose challenges. The grandson is reviving traditions, but will it save the day?

programme.title: The Masterpieces of Tsutaju
programme.desc: This miniseries presents the masterpieces of Tsutaju, a brilliant ukiyo-e producer of the Edo period. This episode takes a close look at artist Utamaro's iconic "Woman with a Glass Noisemaker."

programme.title: Japanology Plus
programme.desc: Deep dives into cultural phenomena with Peter Barakan, a bilingual British broadcaster based in Japan since 1974. Each time, Peter himself discovers something new about Japan.

programme.desc: Railway news from the first half of 2025. From new technologies to farewell runs, join us as we take a look at the latest railway trends and major stories from across Japan.

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: A battle between two alien robot clans, the Autobots and the Decepticons, is reignited on Earth, with a teenage boy being the only one who holds the power to stop it.

programme.title: World War Z
programme.desc: The story revolves around UN employee Gerry Lane, who travels the world in a race against time to stop a pandemic that is toppling armies and governments and threatening to decimate humanity itself.

programme.title: Hypnotic
programme.desc: Determined to find his missing daughter, Austin detective Danny Rourke finds himself spiralling down a rabbit hole while investigating a series of reality-bending bank robberies.

programme.title: Repo Men
programme.desc: Set in the near future when artificial organs can be bought on credit, it revolves around a man who struggles to make the payments on a heart he has purchased.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 7
programme.desc: The lead-footed crew reunites in this turbo-fuelled tale of the vengeful brother of an international terrorist who sets his bloody sights on the boy racers that took his sibling down.

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: The plan was flawless. The execution was perfect. Charlie Croker pulled off the crime of a lifetime.

programme.title: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: Get ready to rumble in the jungle when a tough bounty hunter is sent deep into the Amazon to bring back his boss' son - a job that's not gonna be as easy!

programme.title: Godzilla vs. Kong
programme.desc: Fearsome monsters Godzilla and King Kong square off in an epic battle for the ages, while humanity looks to wipe out both of the creatures and take back the planet once and for all.

programme.title: After Earth
programme.desc: A crashlanding puts a father and son on a dangerous planet - Earth. Hunted by an alien and by evolved animal species, the pair must work together to survive.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt must bring down a ruthless villain and rescue his fiancee.

programme.title: Bad Boys 2
programme.desc: Burnett and Lowrey reunite as out-of-control, trash-talking cops. Bullets fly, cars crash, and laughs explode as they pursue a whacked-out drug lord from the streets of Miami to the barrios of Cuba.

programme.title: 28 Days Later
programme.desc: After a virus wipes out most of the planet, a handful of survivors try to save the human race from extinction.

programme.title: White House Down
programme.desc: After being denied his dream job with the Secret Service, a cop with a bad attitude must save his daughter and the President after heavily armed militants take over the White House.

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: When an Army Major is framed for treason, Reacher discovers she's the target of a massive government conspiracy and risks everything to take down the corrupt organisation.

programme.title: The Forever Purge
programme.desc: The Purge reaches a boiling point as the violence spills over into a never-ending onslaught, and a Hispanic couple flee south to Mexico with the aid of a white rancher family.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle
programme.desc: The crime-busting babes are back as they investigate the theft of a database of witness protection profiles. Their prime suspects? A fallen angel and the creepy Thin Man.

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: The web-spinning superhero must battle his own demons and a barrage of new villains including Sandman and Venom.

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
programme.desc: When college-bound Sam Witwicky learns the truth about the ancient origins of the Transformers, he must accept his destiny and join Optimus Prime and Bumblebee in their epic battle.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 5
programme.desc: In this reunion of the fast and the furious, the speedsters are off to Brazil to attempt to defeat a corrupt businessman who wants them all wiped out.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
programme.desc: After Peter Parker is bitten by a genetically altered spider, he gains new-found, spider-like powers and ventures out to save the city from the machinations of a mysterious reptilian foe.

programme.title: Troy
programme.desc: For the love of a beautiful woman a city will burn to the ground. An epic tale of honour, war, forbidden passion and the towering Trojan Horse.

programme.title: Van Helsing
programme.desc: Legendary monster hunter Van Helsing must rely on the help of the beautiful and mysterious Anna Valeris as he engages in an epic battle with the ultimate forces of darkness.

programme.title: The Mummy (1999)
programme.desc: Archaeologists awaken an Egyptian priest mummified alive 36 centuries ago for killing Pharaoh Seti and sleeping with his mistress. When he escapes from the tomb, he becomes a threat to the world.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: A man learns that he has extraordinary powers and is not of this Earth. But the hero in him must emerge if he is to save the world from annihilation and become the symbol of hope for all mankind.

programme.title: Uncharted
programme.desc: Street-smart Nathan Drake is recruited by seasoned treasure hunter Victor 'Sully' Sullivan to recover a fortune amassed by Ferdinand Magellan, and lost 500 years ago.

programme.title: Bloodshot
programme.desc: Bloodshot, an ex-killer for the mob, is kidnapped and injected with microscopic computers, turning him into a superhuman. Escaping his makers, he seeks revenge.

programme.title: Death Race
programme.desc: In a future where extreme sports have grown into TV reality bloodlust, a speedway champion is ordered by a ruthless warden to suit up and drive - or never see his little girl again.

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: A math savant with more affinity for numbers than people works as a freelance accountant for some of the world's most dangerous criminal organisations.

programme.title: The Dark Knight Rises
programme.desc: It has been years since Batman vanished into the night, turning from hero to fugitive. Everything will change with the arrival of a cunning cat burglar, and the emergence of masked terrorist, Bane.

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
programme.desc: In a twist to the fairy tale, the evil Queen Ravenna orders the Huntsman to capture Snow White so she can rule eternally; however, he trains her in the art of war to defeat the wicked ruler.

programme.title: Batman Begins
programme.desc: Bruce Wayne returns to Gotham and unveils his alter-ego: Batman, a masked crusader who uses his strength, intellect, and high-tech deceptions to fight the sinister forces that threaten the city.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels (2019)
programme.desc: In this next generation, the world's most highly trained women all over the globe are now teams of Angels guided by multiple Bosleys taking on the toughest jobs everywhere.

programme.title: Fast & Furious Presents: Hobbs & Shaw
programme.desc: Hobbs and Shaw, the trash-talking sworn enemies, must team up to take down a cyber-genetically enhanced anarchist with a bio weapon that threatens the fate of humanity.

programme.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
programme.desc: When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

programme.title: Fast & Furious
programme.desc: This high-octane action-thriller sees two men go back to the streets where it all began as they blast their way across Los Angeles and through the Mexican desert.

programme.title: Evil Dead
programme.desc: Five friends head to a remote cabin where they discover the Book of the Dead, and they unwittingly summon up demons living in the nearby woods.

programme.title: Don't Breathe
programme.desc: A group of teens break into a blind man's home, thinking they'll get away with the perfect crime.

programme.title: The Grudge
programme.desc: A house is cursed by a vengeful ghost that curses those who enter it with a violent death.

programme.title: After Earth
programme.desc: A crashlanding puts a father and son on a dangerous planet - Earth. Hunted by an alien and by evolved animal species, the pair must work together to survive.

programme.title: Skyscraper
programme.desc: A security expert must infiltrate a burning skyscraper, 225 storeys above ground, when his family are trapped inside by criminals.

programme.title: Oblivion

programme.desc: In an alternate world, the murder of a government sponsored superhero draws his outlawed colleagues out of retirement, into a mystery that threatens their lives and the world itself.

programme.desc: As global pop star Skye Riley preps for a world tour, she faces terrifying events and the pressures of fame, pushing her to confront her haunting past.

programme.title: Kill
programme.desc: During a train trip to New Delhi, a pair of commandos face an army of invading bandits.

programme.title: King of the Apocalypse
programme.desc: Dakota Adams, son of Oath Keepers' Stewart Rhodes, explores the American militia movement and his father's conviction for seditious conspiracy, amidst a turbulent family life.

programme.title: Thelma
programme.desc: When 93-year-old Thelma Post gets duped by a phone scammer pretending to be her grandson, she sets out on a treacherous quest across the city to reclaim what was taken from her.

programme.title: Greedy People
programme.desc: Residents of a small island town navigate a murder and the discovery of a million dollars, a series of increasingly bad decisions upend the once peaceful community.

programme.title: River Wild
programme.desc: A thrill-seeking trip quickly turns into a desperate fight for survival when white-water rafters become stranded in raging rapids, and someone seems intent on sabotage to ensure secrets stay buried.

programme.title: The Convert
programme.desc: A preacher's violent past is drawn into question and his faith tested as he becomes caught up in a bloody war between Maori tribes after arriving at a British settlement in the 1830s.

programme.title: The Brutalist
programme.desc: In 1947, a visionary architect and his wife flee post-war Europe to rebuild their legacy in the United States, but their lives are transformed by a mysterious, wealthy client.

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: A young land clerk is summoned to a vampire's castle, while his wife falls under the spell of a dark force in her dreams, leading to a perilous journey into the unknown.

programme.title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
programme.desc: The origin story of renegade warrior Furiosa before her encounter and teamup with Mad Max.

programme.title: A Quiet Place: Day One
programme.desc: A young woman named Sam finds herself trapped in New York City during the early stages of an invasion by alien creatures with ultra-sensitive hearing.

programme.title: Watchmen: Chapter II
programme.desc: Former heroes face threats. The Comedian is dead, Dr. Manhattan exiled to Mars, Ozymandias survived an attack and Rorschach is arrested.

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Eddie Brock and Venom must make a devastating decision as they're pursued by a mysterious military man and alien monsters from Venom's home world.

programme.title: Piece by Piece
programme.desc: LEGO bricks tell the life story of singer, songwriter and record producer Pharrell Williams - from his childhood in Virginia to his success in the music and fashion industry.

programme.title: Reagan
programme.desc: From the glitter of Hollywood to the world stage, Ronald Reagan overcomes the odds to become the 40th president of the United States.

programme.title: Bad Boys: Ride or Die
programme.desc: The Bad Boys are back, but this time with a twist: Miami's finest are now on the run.

programme.title: September 5
programme.desc: During the 1972 Munich Olympics, an American sports broadcasting crew finds itself thrust into covering the hostage crisis involving Israeli athletes.

programme.title: Kraven the Hunter
programme.desc: Kraven's complex relationship with his ruthless father starts him down a path of vengeance, motivating him to become not only the greatest hunter in the world, but also one of its most feared.

programme.title: It Ends with Us
programme.desc: Lily overcomes a traumatic childhood to embark on a new life. A meeting with a neurosurgeon sparks a connection but Lily begins to see sides of him that remind her of her parents' relationship.

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Godzilla and the almighty Kong face a colossal threat hidden deep within the planet, challenging their very existence and the survival of the human race.

programme.title: Rewriting Trump
programme.desc: Filmed over a year, exploring the story of Trump's return to power through the lens of biographer and New York Times best-selling author, Michael Wolff.

programme.title: Gladiator II
programme.desc: After his home is conquered by the tyrannical emperors who now lead Rome, Lucius is forced to enter the Colosseum and must look to his past to find strength to return the glory of Rome to its people.

programme.title: The Making of Gladiator II
programme.desc: A special look at the making of Gladiator II, featuring unprecedented access encompassing all aspects of production, from the grand scope of the set to characters, combat, costumes, scoring and more.

programme.title: Anora
programme.desc: Anora, a Brooklyn sex worker, marries an oligarch's son. But when the news reaches Russia, his parents rush to New York to have the marriage annulled, threatening her fairytale.

programme.title: Drive-Away Dolls
programme.desc: Free-spirited Jamie and her demure friend, Marian, embark on a road trip to Tallahassee for a fresh start, but things go wrong when they meet inept criminals along the way.

programme.title: The Watchers
programme.desc: A 28-year-old artist gets stranded in an expansive, untouched forest in western Ireland. Finding shelter, she meets three strangers who are stalked by mysterious creatures every night.

programme.title: Diddy: The Making of a Bad Boy
programme.desc: Exploring Diddy's journey from Sean Combs to Puffy and Diddy, his childhood, music career, and the recent sexual misconduct allegations that challenge perceptions.

programme.title: The Heist Before Christmas
programme.desc: A Christmas-hating boy meets two Santas in the woods, one of whom claims to have fallen from his sleigh, but he is more interested in the other man when he learns he is on the run for robbing a bank.

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: In Oz, two clashing witches, Elphaba and Glinda, form an unlikely friendship. Elphaba, wrongly labeled wicked, seeks to expose the corrupt Wizard ruling the land.

programme.title: The Last Journey
programme.desc: Swedish TV duo Filip and Fredrik travel to France to reignite the passion for life in Filip's father.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
programme.desc: Sonic, Knuckles, and Tails face Shadow, a powerful new foe. Outmatched, they form an unexpected alliance to stop him and protect the planet.

programme.title: If
programme.desc: After discovering she can see everyone's imaginary friends, a girl embarks on a magical adventure to reconnect forgotten IFs with their kids.

programme.title: Dear Santa
programme.desc: A young boy who, in writing his yearly note to Santa, mixes up the letters and sends it to Satan instead.

programme.title: A Different Man
programme.desc: An aspiring actor undergoes a radical medical procedure to transform his appearance. However, his dream face quickly becomes a nightmare as he becomes obsessed with reclaiming what he lost.

programme.title: Funny Birds
programme.desc: College student Charlie returns to her family farm to help her mother. Their lives differ, and when Charlie's French grandmother arrives, old wounds resurface.

programme.title: Mack & Rita
programme.desc: Wakes up after being struck by lightning in a sound bath regression pod to find she has magically transformed into her 70-year-old self.

programme.title: I Now Pronounce You Chuck & Larry
programme.desc: Two firefighters become domestic partners and must carry the masquerade to extremes when an overzealous bureaucrat becomes suspicious of their true relationship.

programme.title: Ghostbusters

programme.desc: After his big league dreams are crushed, Ben McGrath is reluctant to take another swing at redemption for his boss' law firm softball team.

programme.title: Dolittle
programme.desc: The eccentric Dr Dolittle sets sail on an epic adventure to a mythical island, regaining his wit and courage as he crosses old adversaries and discovers wondrous creatures.

programme.title: National Security
programme.desc: Everyone wants them dead, but they might just kill each other first. Two police academy rejects are at each other's throats and on the case of a smuggler with friends in high places.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Dwight presses Jim for information from the trial he was a juror on. Meanwhile, Angela gives birth.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Dwight is chosen for a task in Tallahassee and needs to pick some Scranton staffers to come with him.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: At Sabre HQ, Dwight does all he can to get attention from Nellie Bertram. Back in Scranton, Andy takes over Erin's duties at reception.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Andy forces the remaining Scranton staff to work overtime to make up for all the people in Tallahassee, where Dwight and Packer vie to be Nellie's vice president.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Dwight goes to great lengths to impress Nellie with an overblown demonstration of the new Sabre Store.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Jim tries to warn Dwight when he learns Robert plans to slam the Sabre Store concept. Andy discovers Erin won't be returning to Scranton.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Andy takes a road trip to reclaim Erin, affording Nellie an opportunity to take a run at his manager's position in Scranton.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Robert forces the Scranton branch to host a welcome party for Nellie, but the planners aren't so willing. Erin and Andy role play his break-up from Jessica.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Andy returns to Scranton to find his manager's position usurped by Nellie. Kelly is surprised to learn there is another man more perfect than Ryan.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Andy makes a huge mistake when he shows up at a fundraising auction for Robert Lipton. Nellie needs Darryl to show her how a taco is eaten.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: A drunken Robert shuts a close by Dunder Mifflin branch, leading to Dwight and Jim teaming up to get their clients.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Dwight gives the Scranton branch workers free family portraits. Robert gets a great new opportunity. Andy poses as a janitor in his attempt to rejoin Dunder Mifflin.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Andy hopes to inspire the staff by taking them on a trip to Gettysburg. Meanwhile, those who stay behind are prodded by Robert to come up with great ideas for the company.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: The office has two new faces, Clark and Pete. When Clark gets the nickname 'the New Dwight' and Peter becomes 'the New Jim', it causes existential crises.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Jim and Pam get a surprising invitation to Roy's wedding only to discover that a lot has changed with Roy.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Andy discovers that he may be a distant relative of Michelle Obama. His elation turns to embarrassment after his employees jump to conclusions about his family.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Dwight rents a bus for the office staff to temporarily work in.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Andy invites his former college a capella group to perform for the office during Halloween. However, he gets angry when he hears that his college friend is telling a different story about the group.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Dwight gives the Scranton branch workers free family portraits. Robert gets a great new opportunity. Andy poses as a janitor in his attempt to rejoin Dunder Mifflin.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: The office has two new faces, Clark and Pete. When Clark gets the nickname 'the New Dwight' and Peter becomes 'the New Jim', it causes existential crises.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Jim and Pam get a surprising invitation to Roy's wedding only to discover that a lot has changed with Roy.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Andy discovers that he may be a distant relative of Michelle Obama. His elation turns to embarrassment after his employees jump to conclusions about his family.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Dwight rents a bus for the office staff to temporarily work in.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Andy invites his former college a capella group to perform for the office during Halloween. However, he gets angry when he hears that his college friend is telling a different story about the group.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Andy must help his family when his dad loses all of their money. Meanwhile, Dwight is a guest on a radio show, and his co-workers call in to bother him.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: In order to land the Scranton White Pages as a client, Dwight must confront his inability to speak to women.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Angela goes to Dwight for help when she learns that her husband is having an affair with Oscar.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Erin checks the calendar and realises that the office's annual Christmas party is today, but no one has made any plans for it.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Pam accidentally brings lice into the office and lets Meredith take the fall, while Dwight vows to destroy the parasites. Meanwhile, Jim has a fantastic day with a potential business associate.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Clark returns from his sex jaunt with Jan and gifts the office with a new espresso maker, which everyone abuses. Dwight takes him to sell a father-son suit warehouse.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Jim is forced to miss Cece's first recital after a major investor exits his company. Dwight tries to prevent Darryl from leaving the office. Nellie accidentally outs Pete and Erin.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Dunder Mifflin CEO David Wallace tasks Dwight with finding a part-time replacement for Jim; Dwight in turns enlists several of his close friends, including his cousin.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Someone vandalises Pam's warehouse mural. Distraught, she seeks the help of Dwight and Nellie, who both eagerly help her track down the vandal.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: The office pairs off into pretend couples to take advantage of a Valentine's Day discount at a local mini-mall.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Pam interviews for a job in Philadelphia, but her potential manager reminds her of her former boss, Michael Scott.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Dwight acquires the help of Angela in order to give his elderly Aunt Shirley a bath. Meanwhile, Andy attempts to make Pete and Erin feel uncomfortable.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Oscar attends the funeral of Dwight's Aunt Shirley at Schrute Farms.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Everyone in the office is excited when international promos for the documentary surface, but are soon horrified to discover how much candid filming has taken place.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: The elevators are under maintenance and the office workers have to walk up the stairs, a situation everyone deems the 'stairmageddon'.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Dwight and Angela compete in an office-wide paper airplane contest where the winner gets a prize. Meanwhile, Andy gets his first acting role.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Andy tells David Wallace that he is leaving Dunder Mifflin to pursue acting.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Dwight has his black belt ceremony with his new sensei at the office during lunch.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: As the office staff get ready for the premiere of their documentary, Jim and Dwight fill the position for the assistant to the assistant regional manager.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Andy auditions for the reality TV show The Next Great A Cappella Sensation. Jim expresses his love for Pam, and Dwight expresses his love for Angela.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: The office staff answer questions about the documentary and attend Dwight Schrute and Angela Martin's wedding at Schrute Farms.

programme.desc: Angela goes to Dwight for help when she learns that her husband is having an affair with Oscar.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Erin checks the calendar and realises that the office's annual Christmas party is today, but no one has made any plans for it.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Pam accidentally brings lice into the office and lets Meredith take the fall, while Dwight vows to destroy the parasites. Meanwhile, Jim has a fantastic day with a potential business associate.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Clark returns from his sex jaunt with Jan and gifts the office with a new espresso maker, which everyone abuses. Dwight takes him to sell a father-son suit warehouse.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Jim is forced to miss Cece's first recital after a major investor exits his company. Dwight tries to prevent Darryl from leaving the office. Nellie accidentally outs Pete and Erin.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Dunder Mifflin CEO David Wallace tasks Dwight with finding a part-time replacement for Jim; Dwight in turns enlists several of his close friends, including his cousin.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Someone vandalises Pam's warehouse mural. Distraught, she seeks the help of Dwight and Nellie, who both eagerly help her track down the vandal.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: The office pairs off into pretend couples to take advantage of a Valentine's Day discount at a local mini-mall.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Pam interviews for a job in Philadelphia, but her potential manager reminds her of her former boss, Michael Scott.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Dwight acquires the help of Angela in order to give his elderly Aunt Shirley a bath. Meanwhile, Andy attempts to make Pete and Erin feel uncomfortable.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Oscar attends the funeral of Dwight's Aunt Shirley at Schrute Farms.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Everyone in the office is excited when international promos for the documentary surface, but are soon horrified to discover how much candid filming has taken place.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: The elevators are under maintenance and the office workers have to walk up the stairs, a situation everyone deems the 'stairmageddon'.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Andy must help his family when his dad loses all of their money. Meanwhile, Dwight is a guest on a radio show, and his co-workers call in to bother him.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Dwight and Angela compete in an office-wide paper airplane contest where the winner gets a prize. Meanwhile, Andy gets his first acting role.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Andy tells David Wallace that he is leaving Dunder Mifflin to pursue acting.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Dwight has his black belt ceremony with his new sensei at the office during lunch.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: As the office staff get ready for the premiere of their documentary, Jim and Dwight fill the position for the assistant to the assistant regional manager.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Andy auditions for the reality TV show The Next Great A Cappella Sensation. Jim expresses his love for Pam, and Dwight expresses his love for Angela.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: The office staff answer questions about the documentary and attend Dwight Schrute and Angela Martin's wedding at Schrute Farms.
